summary: We recently compiled a list of the 15 Stocks Targeted By Activist Hedge Funds. headline: FDIC eyes pact with BlackRock on passive investing
summary: The regulator reportedly gave the asset manager a Jan. 10 deadline to agree to stricter oversight when holding a 10% or greater stake in banks, similar to a deal struck last week with Vanguard.

raw.headline: FDIC eyes pact with BlackRock on passive investing

headline: BlackRock’s Bitcoin ETF Posts Record Outflow After Banner Year
